_plugin.Desc: Value of this field should be PostgreSQL for all PostgreSQL related docs
_plugin.Label: Plugin

_documentType.Desc: PostgreSQL doc type - serverDetails, queryDetails, databaseDetails, tableDetails
_documentType.Label: Plugin Type

time.Desc: Time at which document was processed by plugin in UTC
time.Label: Timestamp

server_log_size.Desc: Total size of the log files in the server
server_log_size.Label: Server Log Size

server_connections_count.Desc: Number of connections in the server
server_connections_count.Label: Server Connections Count

server_databases_count.Desc: Number of databases in the server
server_databases_count.Label: Server Databases Count

_plugin.Desc: Value of this field should be PostgreSQL for all PostgreSQL related docs
_plugin.Label: Plugin

_documentType.Desc: PostgreSQL doc type - serverDetails, queryDetails, databaseDetails, tableDetails
_documentType.Label: Plugin Type

time.Desc: Time at which document was processed by plugin in UTC
time.Label: Timestamp

table_last_analyze.Desc: Last time at which this table was manually analyzed
table_last_analyze.Label: Table Last Analyze

table_seq_tup_read.Desc: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans
table_seq_tup_read.Label: Table Seq Tup Read

table_seq_scan.Desc: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table
table_seq_scan.Label: Table Seq Scan

table_idx_tup_fetch.Desc: Number of live rows fetched by index scans
table_idx_tup_fetch.Label: Table Idx Tup Fetch

table_n_tup_hot_upd.Desc: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required)
table_n_tup_hot_upd.Label: Table N Tup Hot Upd

table_analyze_count.Desc: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed
table_analyze_count.Label: Table Analyze Count

table_last_autoanalyze.Desc: Last time at which this table was analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
table_last_autoanalyze.Label: Table Last Autoanalyze

table_last_autovacuum.Desc: Last time at which this table was vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
table_last_autovacuum.Label: Table Last Autovacuum

table_idx_scan.Desc: Number of index scans initiated on this table
table_idx_scan.Label: Table Idx Scan

table_vacuum_count.Desc: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
table_vacuum_count.Label: Table Vacuum Count

table_autoanalyze_count.Desc: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
table_autoanalyze_count.Label: Table Autoanalyze Count

table_last_vacuum.Desc: Last time at which this table was manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
table_last_vacuum.Label: Table Last Vacuum

table_autovacuum_count.Desc: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
table_autovacuum_count.Label: Table Autovacuum Count

_plugin.Desc: Value of this field should be PostgreSQL for all PostgreSQL related docs
_plugin.Label: Plugin

_documentType.Desc: PostgreSQL doc type - serverDetails, queryDetails, databaseDetails, tableDetails
_documentType.Label: Plugin Type

time.Desc: Time at which document was processed by plugin in UTC
time.Label: Timestamp

database_conflicts_confl_lock.Desc: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to lock timeouts
database_conflicts_confl_lock.Label: Database Conflicts Confl Lock

database_blk_write_time.Desc: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds
database_blk_write_time.Label: Database Blk Write Time

database_numbackends.Desc: Number of backends currently connected to this database. This is the only column in this view that returns a value reflecting current state; all other columns return the accumulated values since the last reset.
database_numbackends.Label: Database Numbackends

database_xact_commit.Desc: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed
database_xact_commit.Label: Database Xact Commit

database_stats_reset.Desc: Time at which these statistics were last reset
database_stats_reset.Label: Database Stats Reset

database_temp_files.Desc: Number of temporary files created by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
database_temp_files.Label: Database Temp Files

database_temp_bytes.Desc: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
database_temp_bytes.Label: Database Temp Bytes

database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin.Desc: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to pinned buffers
database_conflicts_confl_bufferpin.Label: Database Conflicts Confl Bufferpin

database_conflicts_confl_tablespace.Desc: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to dropped tablespaces
database_conflicts_confl_tablespace.Label: Database Conflicts Confl Tablespace

database_tup_deleted.Desc: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database
database_tup_deleted.Label: Database Tup Deleted

database_tup_inserted.Desc: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database
database_tup_inserted.Label: Database Tup Inserted

database_tup_fetched.Desc: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database
database_tup_fetched.Label: Database Tup Fetched

database_deadlocks.Desc: Number of deadlocks detected in this database
database_deadlocks.Label: Database Deadlocks

database_conflicts_confl_snapshot.Desc: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to old snapshots
database_conflicts_confl_snapshot.Label: Database Conflicts Confl Snapshot

database_conflicts_confl_deadlock.Desc: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to deadlocks
database_conflicts_confl_deadlock.Label: Database Conflicts Confl Deadlock

database_tup_returned.Desc: Number of rows returned by queries in this database
database_tup_returned.Label: Database Tup Returned

database_blks_hit.Desc: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)
database_blks_hit.Label: Database Blks Hit

database_xact_rollback.Desc: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back
database_xact_rollback.Label: Database Xact Rollback

database_blks_read.Desc: Number of disk blocks read in this database
database_blks_read.Label: Database Blks Read

database_blk_read_time.Desc: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database, in milliseconds
database_blk_read_time.Label: Database Blk Read Time

database_tup_updated.Desc: Number of rows updated by queries in this database
database_tup_updated.Label: Database Tup Updated

database_conflicts.Desc: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.)
database_conflicts.Label: Database Conflicts
